creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Takako and Victor Hauge
description: abstracted pond combining three vantage points: at top, large lotus blossom and foliage highlighted in green wash; two fish jump at upper R; two ducks at L between lotus blossom and leaf; grasshopper at ULQ perched on a blossom; large, abstracted leaf at center; large eel in LRQ; turtle below leaf at L; seaweed
markings: LRC, square intaglio; L roller end, sticker with Japanese inscription
title: Old Pond
